error.message: We have problem with the connection to the database and cannot save your preferences, please try to re-load the page.

info.noCarsAvailable: We cannot find any cars registered to you.

tooltip.text: A car cannot be recycled if it still has loans, if the car has been reported as stolen or if it has been seized by the police. Login to see more information at

error.message: We have problem with the connection to the database and cannot show your cars, please try to re-load the page.

confirm.title: Confirm car

subTitles.confirm: Do you want select this car for recycling?

confirm.info: Adding your car for recycling which will allow you to recycle it at any of our connected recycling companies. This is not binding and the car will only be recycled if you hand over the car to a recycling company.

handover.title: Successfully confirmed for recycling
handover.info: The car has been successfully confirmed for recycling and is now ready to be handed over to a recycling company.

subTitles.nextStep: Next step: Handover the car to recycling company

handover.subInfo: Handover the car to any of the recycling companies below. Some recycling companies offers pick up, see their website or contact them directly for opening hours and details. Once the car has been handed over for recycling you will receive your payment within 2 business days.

cancelModal.title: Cancel the recycling process for this car
cancelModal.info: When you cancel the recycling the car cannot be recycled at the recycling companies until you mark it for recycling again. You can simply redo the process if change your mind.

info.payment: Money will be payed by Fjársýsla ríkisins to your state collector within 2 days of the payment has been initiated. You will find your payment

confirmedBy.fund: Car payment inititated by Fjársýsla ríkisins

deregisterOverview.title: Deregister car
deregisterOverview.info: This process will deregister the car and initiate the payment to car owner and  allow for your company to start the recycling process of the car.

companyInfo.title: Company information
companyInfo.info: The company information will help your customers find and contact you when using the digital car recycling service on island.is.
companyInfo.empty: Add your companies locations so that the users can find your company on iceland.is.

select.title: Select car
select.info: Enter the registration number to the car that you want to deregister. Only cars confirmed by the owner/owners on island.is can be deregistered.

errors.empty: Please enter a car registration number
errors.invalidRegNumber: Please enter registration number in a valid format

deregister.title: Deregister car
deregister.info: Confirm car for deregistration. This process cannot be undone.

recyclingCompanies.title: Recycling companies
recyclingCompanies.info: The company information will help your customers contact you when using the digital car recycling service.
recyclingCompanies.empty: There is no recycling comapany added yet

unauthorized.message: You are not allowed to view this page
